snippet: The legal battle over a 45-year-old banana - in this case, one that Andy Warhol created for the debut album by the Velvet Underground - can continue, even after a federal judge threw out a portion of the suit brought by the band against Warhol's...
abstract: The legal battle over a 45-year-old banana - in this case, one that Andy Warhol created for the debut album by the Velvet Underground - can continue, even after a federal judge threw out a portion of the suit brought by the band against Warhol's foundation.

headline.main: Portion of Suit Over Warhol's Velvet Underground Banana Is Discarded
headline.print_headline: Suit Over Warhol Banana Can Proceed, Judge Says

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Warhol, Andy, Foundation for the Visual Arts
